TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit NavigationCommands extends System.Object
public ref class NavigationCommands abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一组标准的与导航相关的命令。

span.span: Provides a standard set of navigation-related commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类公开一组标准的与导航相关的命令，包括浏览器和文档导航。The class exposes a standard set of navigation-related commands, including browser and document navigation. 有关命令和命令的详细信息，请参阅命令[概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview)。For more information on commands and commanding, see [Commanding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview).

public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ BrowseBack { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取表示 命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示要导航回日记中上一页的意图。This command indicates the intention to navigate back to the previous page in the journal. 和 实现了对 的响应，但不需要使用它;在许多情况下，对该命令的响应的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。 and implement support for responding to the , although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 与 结合使用。The following example shows how to use in conjunction with a . 提供了一个实现，该实现通过在返回到 back 堆栈上的日志项时 导航回来来响应 命令。The provides an implementation that responds to the command by navigating the back, if there are journal entries on the back stack. [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#BrowseBackMARKUP1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/BrowseBack.xaml#browsebackmarkup1)] [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#BrowseBackMARKUP2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/BrowseBack.xaml#browsebackmarkup2)] [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#BrowseBackMARKUP3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/BrowseBack.xaml#browsebackmarkup3)] [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#BrowseBackMARKUP4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/BrowseBack.xaml#browsebackmarkup4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示向前导航日志中的下一页的意图。This command indicates the intention to navigate forward the next page in the journal. 和 实现对 命令的响应，但不需要使用它;在许多情况下，对该命令的响应的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。 and implement support for responding to the command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 与 结合使用。The following example shows how to use in conjunction with a . 提供了一个实现，该实现通过在前滚 ，如果向前堆栈上有日记条目来响应 命令。The provides an implementation that responds to the command by navigating the forward, if there are journal entries on the forward stack. [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#BrowseForwardMARKUP1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/BrowseForward.xaml#browseforwardmarkup1)] [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#BrowseForwardMARKUP2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/BrowseForward.xaml#browseforwardmarkup2)] [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#BrowseForwardMARKUP3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/BrowseForward.xaml#browseforwardmarkup3)] [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#BrowseForwardMARKUP4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/BrowseForward.xaml#browseforwardmarkup4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示要搜索的意图。This command indicates the intention to search. 对于任何给定的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 类，没有用于响应 命令的实现。There is no implementation for responding to the command on any given [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] class. 因此，您需要提供相应的实现，如示例中所示。As such, you need to provide an appropriate implementation, which is shown in the example. ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现与 结合使用来响应 命令的代码。The following example shows how to implement code that responds to the command in conjunction with a .
